caption.p: Effect of light intensity on Arabidopsis rosette weight ( RW), inflorescence weight ( IW) and seed weight ( SW) when infected by UK1-TuMV ( A), JPN1-TuMV ( B) and LS-CMV ( C); and effect of light intensity on Arabidopsis growth period ( GP), reproductive period ( RP) and life period ( LP) when infected by UK1-TuMV ( D), JPN1-TuMV ( E) and LS-CMV ( F). Values are mean Â± standard error of 18 (All), 7 (Group 1) and 11 (Group 2) Arabidopsis accessions.
